pages.text: $(li)Vexes are little creatures that can be summoned by $(l:patchouli:illagers/evoker)Evokers$(/l).$(br)$(li)They are able to fly using their wings and make a lot of damage with the tiny $(l:patchouli:weapons/iron_sword)Iron Sword$(/l) that they have equipped.$(br)$(li)Don't let that the Evoker summon a lot of them, or you will be in a big trouble.
